content: विसृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To spread, be extended or diffused; चंक्रीवदंगरुहधूम्ररुचो विसस्रः <ls>Śi. 5. 8</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">9. 19</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 9.">37</ls>; <ls>Ki. 10. 53.</ls> {@--2@} To return. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To spread, stretch. {@--2@} To cause to prevail or spread.
